body_html:
Thank you @gunan but like you mentioned, hiding errors isn't ideal for our users.

You mentioned above that "we have a few initiatives which can help with this issue in the long term", do you have any issues tracking these?

body:
Thank you @gunan but like you mentioned, hiding errors isn't ideal for our users.

You mentioned above that "we have a few initiatives which can help with this issue in the long term", do you have any issues tracking these?
